lead_paragraph: Two new private investment funds, called Rural Business Investment Companies, are part of a Department of Agriculture program to attract private equity investments in agriculture-related businesses.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Backs Private Bid for $125 Million for Rural Investment
headline.main: U.S. Backs Private Bid for $125 Million for Rural Investment

snippet: Two new private investment funds, called Rural Business Investment Companies, are part of a Department of Agriculture program to attract private equity investments in agriculture-related businesses.
abstract: Agriculture Dept Sec Tom Vilsack prepares to unveil latest element of his agency's push to encourage private equity investments in agriculture-related businesses; will support two private investment funds called Rural Business Investment Companies in their effort to raise $125 million to buy stakes in businesses across rural America.
